title: STAR WARS: Episode 1 Jedi Power Battles
description: Take back the Theed Palace in this fast and furious lightsaber action game. You will have the power of the Force and your trusty lightsaber to help you ward off legions of battle droids, destroyer droids, assassins , and other creatures from Star Wars: The Phantom Menace. Mosa Lina

system_requirements.Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 945 / Intel Core i5-750
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon R7 260X / Intel Arc A310
